name: JSE Limited
description: JSE Limited operates as a multi-asset class stock exchange in South Africa. It offers listing services for securities and debt instruments; trading, colocation, and client support services across its markets; post-trade services, such as risk management, as well as clearing and settlement assurance for the exchange's equity, bonds, and derivatives markets; transfer secretarial services, including share register maintenance, issuer communication, the handling of corporate actions, and share scheme management to issuers; and central securities depository service. The company provides market data products comprising live data for JSE-listed equities, derivatives, and bonds, as well as a selection of historical data products to market professionals and data distributors; and Issuer Services, including results presentations and investor engagements, annual general meeting facilitation, and training through the JSE Training Academy. In addition, it operates a private placements platform to address the needs of companies that seek to raise capital. The company was founded in 1887 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.
